Class Documentation

class LeakPub : private Publisher

Publisher for leak sensor data.

Author

Nelson Durrant

Date

September 2024

Public Functions

virtual void setup(rcl_node_t node)

This function sets up the leak publisher.

Parameters

node – the micro-ROS node

void publish(bool leak)

This function publishes the leak data to the micro-ROS agent.

Parameters

leak – the leak data (true if leak, false if no leak)

inline void destroy(rcl_node_t node)

This function destroys the publisher.

Parameters

node – the micro-ROS node
